page.title: 09TRADE & TOURISM
page.content: Warmwell & Broadmayne both have a dual General Store & Sub-Post Office. A recent campaign asked people to keep using these sub-offices.The Broadmayne shop is also an off- licence & supplies bread since the Bakery closed in August 1985.Only Broadmayne has a public house,The Black Dog.It provides meals,games & music.Broadmayne has 2 all purpose garages.Warmwell has a saddlery.A milkman who calls daily except Sunday,also provides a wide range of groeries.An ice-cream van comes & fishmonger every Friday.Some people run small businesses from home including a farm & garden shop.Dorset has many tourists from Easter to September.Some people provide bed & breakfast accommodation,others cream teas,camping space & holiday cottages.
